author: Peter Knegt
title: These are the 12 Canadians you can root for on Oscar night | CBC Arts
text: These are the 12 Canadians you can root for on Oscar night These are the 12 Canadians you can root for on Oscar night Ryan Gosling isn't the only Canuck gunning for gold on Sunday Peter Knegt · CBC Arts · February 22 Ryan Gosling arrives at the 89th Academy Awards Nominees Luncheon at The Beverly Hilton Hotel on Monday, Feb. 6, 2017, in Beverly Hills, Calif. (Photo by Jordan Strauss/Invision/AP)(Jordan Strauss/Invision/AP) About the Author Peter Knegt Peter Knegt has been CBC Arts' digital producer since way back in 2016. He has been working as a journalist for over a decade, and is also the filmmaker of numerous short films and the author of the book About Canada: Queer Rights. You can follow him on Instagram and Twitter with the same obvious handle: @peterknegt.
